article_title: Obama Tells Kimmel He Can't Have Hillary's New Email Address
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

President Obama joked about Hillary Clinton’s e-mails on Thursday’s “Jimmy Kimmel Live” on ABC.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

During a discussion the technology the president uses and his interaction with it, Kimmel asked “do you have Hillary Clinton’s new e-mail address?” The president responded, “I can’t share it with you. I don’t think she’d want you to have it. She specifically said — she said ‘you know what, you’re going on ‘Kimmel,’ if he asks for the e-mail address, no way.'”

Follow Ian Hanchett on Twitter @IanHanchett
